literalstring.name: Hardware-based security: Unlike software-based solutions, the TPM is a dedicated hardware security chip physically isolated from the main system. This isolation makes it tamper-resistant and less susceptible to software vulnerabilities and attacks.
literalstring.text: Hardware-based security: Unlike software-based solutions, the TPM is a dedicated hardware security chip physically isolated from the main system. This isolation makes it tamper-resistant and less susceptible to software vulnerabilities and attacks.
